Tokisaki:ShadowShot.NAME: Shadow Shot
Tokisaki:ShadowShot.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Damage !D! damage. NL Tokisaki:shadow 2 - Draw !M! cards. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - Heal !M! health.

Tokisaki:Aleph.NAME: 1st Bullet, Aleph
Tokisaki:Aleph.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Beth.NAME: 2nd Bullet, Beth
Tokisaki:Beth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemy, Apply Weak !M!, Vulnerable !M!. and Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Gimel.NAME: 3rd Bullet, Gimel
Tokisaki:Gimel.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Upgrade 1 card for the rest of combat. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - Instead Upgrade all cards in your hand.
Tokisaki:Gimel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - And Upgrade all cards in your draw pile too.

Tokisaki:Daleth.NAME: 4th Bullet, Daleth
Tokisaki:Daleth.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Make current health to half of maximum health. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Waw.NAME: 6th Bullet, Waw
Tokisaki:Waw.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. It costs 0. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Heth.NAME: 8th Bullet, Heth
Tokisaki:Heth.DESCRIPTION: When you use a Strike card, the Strike card is used one more time.

Tokisaki:Tet.NAME: 9th Bullet, Tet
Tokisaki:Tet.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Kurumi card in your hand.
Tokisaki:Tet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Kurumi card in your hand. and Upgrade.

Tokisaki:Yod.NAME: 10th Bullet, Yod
Tokisaki:Yod.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage equal to your lost health. NL Exhaust.
Tokisaki:Yod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals damage equal to your lost health.

Tokisaki:YodAleph.NAME: 11th Bullet, Yod Aleph
Tokisaki:YodAleph.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Tokisaki:shadow, Gain 3 Strength and Dexterity. End your turn. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:YodBeth.NAME: 12th Bullet, Yod Beth
Tokisaki:YodBeth.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 9 cards in your hand. Gain 5 Tokisaki:shadow. Lose HP equal to the current floor. NL Exhaust.
Tokisaki:YodBeth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 9 cards in your hand. Gain 5 Tokisaki:shadow. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Cat.NAME: Cat
Tokisaki:Cat.DESCRIPTION: Lose as much health as Tokisaki:cat, deal damage to all enemies, or draw a card. NL Exhaust.
Tokisaki:Cat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose as much health as Tokisaki:cat, deal damage to all enemies, draw a card, or gain a buffer NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:CatKingdom.NAME: Cat Kingdom
Tokisaki:CatKingdom.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain as much as Tokisaki:cat (Max 5) Strength, Dexterity, or Thorns.

Tokisaki:ActinidiaBranch.NAME: Actinidia Branch
Tokisaki:ActinidiaBranch.DESCRIPTION: Lose half Tokisaki:cat. Gain Tokisaki:cat golds.

Tokisaki:CatPunch.NAME: Cat Punch
Tokisaki:CatPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage Tokisaki:cat times. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:ShadowCat.NAME: Shadow Cat
Tokisaki:ShadowCat.DESCRIPTION: Consume all Tokisaki:shadow and Gain Tokisaki:cat as much as you consume.
Tokisaki:ShadowCat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Tokisaki:cat as much as Tokisaki:shadows.

Tokisaki:Rampage.NAME: Rampage
Tokisaki:Rampage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemy. Tokisaki:shadow - !M! : Not 2, 3 times.

Tokisaki:SpatialQuake.NAME: Spatial Quake
Tokisaki:SpatialQuake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemy. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:AreaExpansion.NAME: Area Expansion
Tokisaki:AreaExpansion.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply 1 Tokisaki:corrosion to all enemies.
Tokisaki:AreaExpansion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, apply 1 Tokisaki:corrosion to all enemies.

Tokisaki:CorrosionFlood.NAME: CorrosionFlood
Tokisaki:CorrosionFlood.DESCRIPTION: Consume all Tokisaki:shadows and Apply Tokisaki:corrosion as much as you consume.

Tokisaki:OwnerOfTheCastle.NAME: Owner of the castle
Tokisaki:OwnerOfTheCastle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Skill this turn, gain 1 Tokisaki:shadow.
Tokisaki:OwnerOfTheCastle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Whenever you play an Skill this turn, gain 1 Tokisaki:shadow.

Tokisaki:Nightmare.NAME: Nightmare
Tokisaki:Nightmare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !M! Tokisaki:shadow. Apply !M! Tokisaki:corrosion.

Tokisaki:Araara.NAME: ARA ARA
Tokisaki:Araara.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Draw a card. NL Tokisaki:shadow 2 - Draw 2 cards. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - Draw 2 cards.
Tokisaki:Araara.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Draw a card and Gain !B! Block. NL Tokisaki:shadow 2 - Draw 2 cards and Gain !B! Block. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - Draw 2 cards.

Tokisaki:EEDeathwa.NAME: EE Death Wa
Tokisaki:EEDeathwa.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Tokisaki:corrosion. Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Psycho.NAME: Psycho death wa
Tokisaki:Psycho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Inverts when used.

Tokisaki:Kihihihi.NAME: Kihihihi
Tokisaki:Kihihihi.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Gain !B! Block. NL Tokisaki:shadow 2 - Gain !B! Block. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - Gain !B! Block.

Tokisaki:Crazy.NAME: Crazy
Tokisaki:Crazy.DESCRIPTION: Randomly changes the cost of all cards in your hand. It will last for the duration of this battle. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Three.NAME: Three
Tokisaki:Three.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. Gain 3 Tokisaki:shadow.

Tokisaki:Elohim.NAME: Elohim
Tokisaki:Elohim.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow3 - Gain 6 Plated Armor. NL Tokisaki:shadow 5 - Gain 1 Artifact. NL Tokisaki:shadow 7 - Gain 1 Buffer. NL Tokisaki:shadow 9 - Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:SchoolUniform.NAME: School Uniform
Tokisaki:SchoolUniform.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! gold.

Tokisaki:GreatDetective.NAME: Great Detective
Tokisaki:GreatDetective.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, draw 3 cards.
Tokisaki:GreatDetective.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, draw 3 cards. and gain 1 energy.

Tokisaki:MagicDetective.NAME: Magic Detective
Tokisaki:MagicDetective.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:Shadow 1 - Apply 2 weak. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - Apply 3 Tokisaki:corrosion. NL Tokisaki:shadow 5 - Apply Slow.
Tokisaki:MagicDetective.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Apply 2 weak. NL Tokisaki:shadow 2 - Apply 3 Tokisaki:corrosion. NL Tokisaki:shadow 3 - Apply Slow.

Tokisaki:Clockwork.NAME: Clockwork
Tokisaki:Clockwork.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow 12 - After !M! turns, Deal 1200 damage to all enemy at turn end.

Tokisaki:ShadowHand.NAME: Shadow Hand
Tokisaki:ShadowHand.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:shadow !M! - Reduces all defend and deal !D! damage.

Tokisaki:TimeAttack.NAME: Time Attack
Tokisaki:TimeAttack.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, Gain 3 Strength, Dexterity and Tokisaki:corrosion.
Tokisaki:TimeAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, Gain 3 Strength, Dexterity and Tokisaki:corrosion.

Tokisaki:ShadowOfShadow.NAME: Shadow of Shadow
Tokisaki:ShadowOfShadow.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, Gain !M! Tokisaki:shadow.

Tokisaki:Restoration.NAME: Restoration
Tokisaki:Restoration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a card. Gain energy equal to its cost.

Tokisaki:ElegantShot.NAME: Elegant Shot
Tokisaki:ElegantShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. if Fatal, draw a card.
Tokisaki:ElegantShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. if Fatal, draw a card and gain 1 energy.

Tokisaki:Crooked.NAME: Crooked
Tokisaki:Crooked.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. Add a Wound X cards into your discard pile.
Tokisaki:Crooked.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+2 times. Add a Wound X cards into your discard pile.

Tokisaki:SealedEye.NAME: Sealed Mystic Eye
Tokisaki:SealedEye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemy. Remove all Buff and Debuff.

Tokisaki:Trample.NAME: Trample
Tokisaki:Trample.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage equal to !M!% of maximum health.

Tokisaki:BloodAndShadow.NAME: Blood And Shadow
Tokisaki:BloodAndShadow.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! hp. Deal !D! damage. NL Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Heal 2 hp.

Tokisaki:DoubleTap.NAME: Double Tap
Tokisaki:DoubleTap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Tokisaki:shadow 1 - Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Tokisaki:shadow 2 - Draw !M! cards.

Tokisaki:ALittleBigCat.NAME: A Little Big Cat
Tokisaki:ALittleBigCat.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and Apply weak equal to Tokisaki:cat. NL Exhaust.
Tokisaki:ALittleBigCat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and Apply weak equal to Tokisaki:cat.

Tokisaki:BrokenCat.NAME: Broken Cat
Tokisaki:BrokenCat.DESCRIPTION: The cost of this card changes each time it is drawn. NL You never know what will happen to your enemy.

Tokisaki:GoodMeal.NAME: Enjoy the meal
Tokisaki:GoodMeal.DESCRIPTION: Deal (!D! + Consuming all Tokisaki:shadodw and Tokisaki:corrosion damage. if Fatal, raise your Max HP by 5. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:SpreadingCorrosion.NAME: Spreading Corrosion
Tokisaki:SpreadingCorrosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If enemy has Tokisaki:corrosion, make Tokisaki:corrosion !M! times. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Mozambique.NAME: Mozambique Drill
Tokisaki:Mozambique.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. and Deal !D!+8 damage again.

Tokisaki:TimeIsGold.NAME: Time is gold
Tokisaki:TimeIsGold.DESCRIPTION: Gain gold equal to its Tokisaki:corrosion !M! times.

Tokisaki:TheMore.NAME: The More, The Merrier
Tokisaki:TheMore.DESCRIPTION: When you win this battle, you will receive a random artifact as a reward. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:CatHand.NAME: Cat Hand
Tokisaki:CatHand.DESCRIPTION: Lending hand of cat. Repeat Tokisaki:cat times.

Tokisaki:DayOfCat.NAME: Day of cat
Tokisaki:DayOfCat.DESCRIPTION: Draw this card, If you have enough energy, play this card auto. Apply 1 Intangible to everyone. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:CorrosionCat.NAME: Corrosion Cat
Tokisaki:CorrosionCat.DESCRIPTION: Apply Tokisaki:corrosion equal to Tokisaki:cat. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:CatIsBestMedicine.NAME: Cat is Best Medicine
Tokisaki:CatIsBestMedicine.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all curse and status cards from the draw pile, hand, and discard pile, and removes all debuffs. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:ShadowRain.NAME: ShadowRain
Tokisaki:ShadowRain.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, Deal damage equal to Tokisaki:shadow all enemy.
Tokisaki:ShadowRain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of each turn, Deal damage equal to Tokisaki:shadow all enemy.

Tokisaki:Nekomimi.NAME: Nekomimi
Tokisaki:Nekomimi.DESCRIPTION: Cost of every cards be !M!. But Tokisaki:cat can be capricious.

Tokisaki:CorrosionShield.NAME: Corrosion Shield
Tokisaki:CorrosionShield.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, Gain Block equal to Tokisaki:corrosion in all enemy.

Tokisaki:Zaphkiel.NAME: Zaphkiel
Tokisaki:Zaphkiel.DESCRIPTION: When you use card, Draw a card. But You can not play more 12 cards per turn.

Tokisaki:WholeWorldIsCat.NAME: Whole world is cat
Tokisaki:WholeWorldIsCat.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each turn, Gain !M! random cards.

Tokisaki:CreateBullet.NAME: Create Bullet
Tokisaki:CreateBullet.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each turn, Gain 0 cost Strike Card in DrawPile
Tokisaki:CreateBullet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each turn, Gain 0 cost Strike Card in DrawPile and DiscardPile.

Tokisaki:BulletReplenishment.NAME: Bullet Replenishment
Tokisaki:BulletReplenishment.DESCRIPTION: When you use a strike card, draw 1 card and gain 1 armor.
Tokisaki:BulletReplenishment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you use a strike card, draw 1 card and gain 1 armor.

Tokisaki:BloodAndTime.NAME: Blood And Time
Tokisaki:BloodAndTime.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 hp. Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Tokisaki:shadow.

Tokisaki:Trash.NAME: Trash
Tokisaki:Trash.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:cat brought it. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Fish.NAME: Fish
Tokisaki:Fish.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:cat brought it. NL Heal 5 hp. Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:Flower.NAME: Flower
Tokisaki:Flower.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:cat brought it. NL Gain !M! Energy. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:AngryCat.NAME: Angry Cat
Tokisaki:AngryCat.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:cat brought it. NL When draw this card, Exhaust random card. NL Exhaust.

Tokisaki:HappyCat.NAME: Happy Cat
Tokisaki:HappyCat.DESCRIPTION: Tokisaki:cat brought it. Gain !M! Energy and Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
